snippet: Soula Alevridou’s gift of about $1,300, in part to buy pink training outfits, has caused an uproar as officials debate the appropriateness of having a brothel owner step in.
abstract: Larissa Journal; gift from Soula Alevridou, owner of two luxury brothels in Larissa, Greece, to struggling local soccer team has caused something of uproar as officials debate propriety of accepting gift from brothel owner, even during time when few businesses have cash to help young men play sports.
lead_paragraph: Soula Alevridou’s gift of about $1,300, in part to buy pink training outfits, has caused an uproar as officials debate the appropriateness of having a brothel owner step in.

headline.seo: Greek Brothel Owner Rescues Larissa Soccer Club
headline.main: In Land of Bailouts, Greek Madam Rescues Local Soccer Team
headline.print_headline: In Land of Bailouts, Greek Madam Rescues Local Soccer Team
